Package screens

Class SetUpScreen

java.lang.Object
screens.SetUpScreen
public class SetUpScreen extends Object
The SetUpScreen is where the user enters their name, team name, preferred game length, and difficulty
Launched upon execution
Launches DraftScreen upon closing
Version:
1.1, May 2023.
Author:
Lachlan Stewart and Stephen Hockey

      public boolean validString(String input, int lowerBound, int upperBound)
      Checks if string is valid for given bounds and hard coded regex
      Parameters:
      input - string to test as a String
      lowerBound - the smallest valid string size as an integer
      upperBound - the largest valid string size as an integer
      Returns:
      if the string meets the given size and regex criteria as a boolean
